footnotes.footnote: Source: African Statistical Yearbook, Economic Commission for Africa (Addis Ababa).
Twelve months ending 30 June of year stated.
Source: Afristat: Sub-Saharan African Observatory of Economics and Statistics (Bamako).
Twelve months ending 31 March of year stated.
Source: Country Economic Review, Asian Development Bank (Manila).
Break in series; data prior to the sign not comparable to following years.
